name: erb
description: Compile a given Embedded RuBy (ERB) template using variables and functions defined in given a JavaScript object

scripts.build: bundle install --path vendor/bundle && mkdir -p ruby && bundle exec opal-build base64 > ruby/base64.js && bundle exec opal-build opal/compiler > ruby/opal-compiler.js && bundle exec opal-build corelib/string/unpack > ruby/corelib-string-unpack.js && bundle exec opal-build --stub erb opal/erb > ruby/opal-erb.js && bundle exec opal-build opal > ruby/opal.js && bundle exec opal-build json > ruby/json.js && bundle exec opal-build template > ruby/template.js

author: Vytautas Jakutis <vytautas@jakut.is> (https://jakut.is/)
